attributes.action: Boycott Sky Sports high priced Pay per view football
attributes.additional_details: Government or Parliament should be looking out for customers and preventing them getting ripped off further by Premier league clubs
attributes.background: Clamp down on the greed of Premier league clubs overcharging on games shown PPV after people have already subscribed to BT sports or Sky sports

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. This is a matter for broadcasters and the football authorities.
